definition: to step out/to take a (first) step

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc

sentences.english: It starts with that deep breath of confidence you take before the first step.
sentences.chinese: 千里之行，開始於邁出第一步前那口自信的深呼吸。

sentences.english: The third improvement is audio quality, which has taken a gigantic step forward.
sentences.chinese: 第三個改進是音質，這一點相較以前邁出了一大步。

sentences.english: You will make long strides in your career this year - as long as you keep faith in yourself.
sentences.chinese: 只要相信自己雙子就會在職業生涯中會邁出一大步。

sentences.english: If you have done this, you have taken the first step for success.
sentences.chinese: 假如你已經這麼做了，那麼你已向成功邁出了第一步。

sentences.english: The study benefits ultra-sound quantitative diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 在超聲定量診斷研究上邁出了一步。

sentences.english: Abe told reporters after the talks that the countries made a "first step" toward reconciliation.
sentences.chinese: 會談後，安倍對記者說，兩國朝和解邁出了第一步。

sentences.english: And this year is as good as any to do that.
sentences.chinese: 而今年，跟任何一年一樣，都是邁出新步伐的好時機。

sentences.english: But keep in mind this is a baby step on a long road to a truly market-determined yuan exchange rate.
sentences.chinese: 但是要記住，漫漫長路我們才邁出了一小步。

sentences.english: This initiative is an important step toward reversing the resource curse.
sentences.chinese: 這個動議是朝着扭轉資源詛咒邁出的重要一步。

sentences.english: It is a small step in reducing the bigotry of monocultures.
sentences.chinese: 這位減少單一文化的偏執邁出了一小步。

sentences.english: This is an important step in the right direction.
sentences.chinese: “這是朝着正確方向邁出的重要一步”。

sentences.english: And the above points are a great step forward for SNDA.
sentences.chinese: 上述各點是SNDA向前邁出的一大步。

sentences.english: This hearing was a major step forward in getting the bill passed.
sentences.chinese: 這場聽證會向法案的最終通過邁出了重要的一步。

sentences.english: Take just 1 step forward today. What will it be?
sentences.chinese: 今天只向前邁出1步，將會是什麼樣的狀況呢？

sentences.english: Torquato et. al. paper thus represents the first step towards a similar approach.
sentences.chinese: 的論文代表了納米科技中向類似途徑邁出的第一步。

sentences.english: She's the one who helps you for the first step, she's the one who bares all the mishap.
sentences.chinese: 她幫助你邁出第一步，她會幫你承受所有的不幸。
